about.subtitle: Passionate Web Developer & Tech Creator
about.description: Hello, my name is Takahiro Asami. I am originally from Japan and currently based in Montreal. I am passionate about front-end development, particularly using React and JavaScript, while also having a foundation in back-end development. Curious and motivated, I enjoy learning new skills and working collaboratively with others.

quiz.title: Quiz App
quiz.description: An interactive quiz application built with React. Users can answer questions, view their final score with a confetti animation, and navigate between pages using React Router. Quiz data is stored separately for better maintainability.

recipes.title: Recettes Faciles
recipes.description: A simple recipe management application where users can add recipes and search by title or ingredients. Data is stored locally using LocalStorage.
